Package laborator_2.homework

Class Airport

java.lang.Object
laborator_2.homework.Location
laborator_2.homework.Airport
public class Airport extends Location
The "Airport" class represents an Airport that extends the Location class. This class has a number of terminals and inherits all the characteristics of a normal location.
